sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Grid, makeStyles, Paper, Typography, Card, CardActionArea } from '@material-ui/core'

const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({
    paper: {
        padding: theme.spacing(3),
        textAlign: 'left',
        // height: "100%",
        // width: "80%",
        backgroundColor: "#fafafa"
    },
    mainContainer: {
        width: '100vw',
    },
    card: {
        height: "100%",
        width: "80%",
    }
}));

function Projects() {
    const classes = useStyles();

    return (
        <Grid
            container
            className={classes.mainContainer}
            direction="column"

        >

            {/* Projects cards Container  */}
            <Grid container justify="flex-start" spacing={2}>

                {/* Card */}
                <Grid item container justify="center" xs={12} sm={6} md={4} >
                    <Card className={classes.card}>
                        <CardActionArea onClick={() => { window.open('http://www.youtube.com'); }}>
                            <Paper className={classes.paper} >
                                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                                    React
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="body2" align="left" gutterBottom>
                                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="overline" align="left">
                                    Raspberry-Pi, Python, Hardware
                                </Typography>
                            </Paper>
                        </CardActionArea>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>

                {/* Card */}
                <Grid item container justify="center" xs={12} sm={6} md={4} >
                    <Card className={classes.card}>
                        <CardActionArea onClick={() => { window.open('http://www.youtube.com'); }}>
                            <Paper className={classes.paper}>
                                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                                    Javascript
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="body2" align="left" gutterBottom>
                                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="overline" align="left">
                                    Raspberry-Pi, Python, Hardware
                                 </Typography>
                            </Paper>
                        </CardActionArea>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>

                {/* Card */}
                <Grid item container justify="center" xs={12} sm={6} md={4} >
                    <Card className={classes.card}>
                        <CardActionArea onClick={() => { window.open('http://www.youtube.com'); }}>
                            <Paper className={classes.paper}>
                                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                                    Firebase
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="body2" align="left" gutterBottom>
                                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="overline" align="left">
                                    Raspberry-Pi, Python, Hardware
                                </Typography>
                            </Paper>
                        </CardActionArea>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>

                {/* Card */}
                <Grid item container justify="center" xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                    <Card className={classes.card}>
                        <CardActionArea onClick={() => { window.open('https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ELDtlUnp3reLzYD28Kdq0ZQcwJ63GOct?usp=sharing'); }}>
                            <Paper className={classes.paper} >
                                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                                    Python
                                 </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="body2" align="left" gutterBottom>
                                    Voor het automatiseren van mijn rolluik voor mijn slaapkamerraam heb ik gebruik gemaakt van een Raspberry Pi en geprogrammeerd in Python om het op vaste tijden vanzelf omhoog en omlaag te bedienen.
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="overline" align="left">
                                    Raspberry-Pi, Python, Hardware
                                </Typography>
                            </Paper>
                        </CardActionArea>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>

            </Grid>
        </Grid>
    );
}

export default Projects;
